mapper.select: SELECT * FROM t_account_info WHERE account_no = #{accountNo} and status = 0 LIMIT 1
select * from t_account_info where merchant_no = #{merchantNo} and account_type = #{accountType}
mapper.update: UPDATE t_account_info set balance = balance - unbalance - #{amount},version = version +1 WHERE account_no = #{accountNo} and balance >= #{amount} and version = #{version}
UPDATE t_account_info set balance = balance + #{amount},version = version +1 WHERE account_no = #{accountNo} and version = #{version}
UPDATE t_account_info set unbalance = unbalance + #{amount},version = version +1 WHERE account_no = #{accountNo} and version = #{version} and balance - unbalance >= #{amount}
UPDATE t_account_info set unbalance = unbalance - #{amount},version = version +1 WHERE account_no = #{accountNo} and version = #{version} and unbalance >= #{amount}
UPDATE t_account_info set account_status = #{accountStatus},version = version + 1,account_manage_serial = account_manage_serial + 1 WHERE account_no = #{accountNo} and version = #{version}
